news_title: Ethereum Turns 2016 DAO Hack Funds Into $220 Million Security Endowment
news_subtitle: Unclaimed 2016 DAO hack funds become $220M Ethereum security endowment. 69,420 ETH staked for annual grants.

news_title: TheDAO Funds Revived for $220M Ethereum Security

news_title: Unclaimed ETH From the DAO Hack to Fund a Security Fund

news_title: Why Vitalik Buterin Just Pulled 16,384 ETH From His Holdings
news_subtitle: Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin just withdrew 16,384 ETH from his personal holdings. The funds will go toward projects the Ethereum Foundation can no longer take on. Buterin announced that the EF is entering a “period of mild austerity” over the next five years. The foundatio...

news_title: Vitalik Buterin Pledges 16,384 ETH for Open, Secure Tech
